subtask1.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the turn detection
subtask1.desc: Fields adaption on dstc data and some other open source dialogs; Negative sampling based on knowledge similarity and different granularities; Data augment based on back translation; Extend recall based on knowledge similarity.

subtask2.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the knowledge selection
subtask2.desc: The dialogue dataset pre-trained the model, the fine-tuning phase was divided into two modules, recall modules and sorting modules, both modules are dicclassification models, and the results obtained by the recall module were sorted after amplified recall

subtask3.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the response generation
subtask3.desc: Restructure the training data to fine-tune the response style transfer problem
